word_mean: 介子：存在时间很短的亚原子粒子，存在时间一般短于质子而长于电子，可带正、负或中性电荷

sentence.Network_en: But, the messenger has gone several, the meson cannot push.
sentence.Network_cn: 可是, 差人去了几趟, 介子推不来.

sentence.Network_en: Button shaped beads pendant , Earing, a meson, welcome to order!
